00096   class ALVAR_EXPORT UnscentedKalman {
00097   private:
00098     int state_n;
00099     int state_k;
00100     int obs_n;
00101     int sigma_n;
00102     bool sigmasUpdated;
00103         double lambda, lambda2;
00104 
00105     CvMat *state;
00106     CvMat *stateCovariance;

00124     CvMat **sigma_predObs;
00125 
00126     // possess state mean and co-variance (as a list of sigma points).
00127     // generate sigma points from state mean vector and co-variance matrix.
00128     // compute state mean vector and co-variance matrix from sigma points.
00129 
00130     // predict: 
00131     //  - map sigma points thru process model f.
00132 
00133     // update:
00134     //  - map sigma points thru h.
00135     //  - from current sigma points and sigma observations:
00136     //   - compute state estimate x and co-variance P.
00137     //   - compute predicted observation z and innocation co-variance Z
00138     //   - compute cross correlation XZ
00139     //  - compute new state mean and co-variance.
00140     //  - generate new sigma points.
00141   public:
00142 
00160     UnscentedKalman(int state_n, int obs_n, int state_k = 0, double alpha = 0.001, double beta = 2.0);
00161     ~UnscentedKalman();
00162 
00173     CvMat *getState() { return state; }
00174 
00184     CvMat *getStateCovariance() { return stateCovariance; }
00185 
00191     void initialize();
00192 
00201     void predict(UnscentedProcess *process_model);
00202 
00213     void update(UnscentedObservation *observation);
00214   };
